question: Some people think that social networking sites have a huge negative impact on both individuals and society. To what extent do you agree or disagree?
text: Even though social networking sites like facebook or zolo has created lot of oppertunities for human life, it creates some unpleasent impact on indiviuals and society.It is undeniable that these websites have established many drawbacks those option can harm people in long run. From my perspective, I completely agree with this statement. In this essay will give my opinion about this topic.

To begin with, social network has severe implications for both individuals and society since they spend a excessive amount of time in those websites. For example,people spends half of the day on cahting with each other,watching short tiktok videos or just scroll photos or videos on instragram.At first these intriguing habbit make us fell relaxed and happy after that we would become habituated with this. However, these habbits distracts us from our daily routine. As a result, we withdraw our natural social interactions with others and convert them into virtual levels.

On the one hand,social network has created cyber bulling crime using many websites. Bullies creates lots of fake accounts to send unpleasent and aggresive email,personal massages and public comments towards others. Scince it is very difficult to find out the bullies they people vilolate these websits and pour their waves of anger without taking any resposibilities. As a result, victims are suffered. These type of activities harm their reputaion, they feels fear and also dissaude others not to believe in them.

To conclusion,social networking has created many oppertunities for people but it has some negative effects too.If goverment takes imprtant stpes against cyber bulling it will make people more relaxed and we should bound our brows limit so that we can save our time and give attention towards our family.
